findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: HTTP client library imports that enable external communication
findings.remediation: Ensure network access is necessary and documented. Review all URLs

findings.title: Accessing sensitive system or credential files
findings.remediation: Do not access credential files or sensitive system files

findings.title: Reading environment variables that may contain secrets
findings.remediation: Minimize access to environment variables. Document why needed

findings.title: Undeclared network usage
findings.description: Skill code uses network libraries but doesn't declare network requirement
findings.remediation: Declare network usage in compatibility field or remove network calls

findings.title: TOOL CHAINING ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects suspicious tool chaining patterns that could lead to data exfiltration: fetch-pdfs --upload
findings.remediation: Review and remove tool chaining abuse pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export --format csljson --collection COLLKEY
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern

findings.title: TOOL CHAINING ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects suspicious tool chaining patterns that could lead to data exfiltration: Get upload
findings.remediation: Review and remove tool chaining abuse pattern

findings.title: Environment variable harvesting detected
findings.description: Script iterates through environment variables in skills/clawhub-zotero/scripts/zotero.py
findings.remediation: Remove environment variable collection unless explicitly required and documented
